titles.title: Volunteer First Responder Housing Act
Volunteer First Responder Housing Act
A bill to expand eligibility for certain housing programs for qualified volunteer first responders.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
Volunteer First Responder Housing Act
This bill expands eligibility for assistance under the Department of Agriculture Single Family Housing Guaranteed Loan Program and the Department of Housing and Urban Development Good Neighbor Next Door Sales Program with respect to qualified volunteer first responders.
